        Clinix Healthcare has 40 years of qualitative experience in Medical and Diagnostic services with over 120 centers across Africa. The state-of-the art Diagnostic Centre represents a milestone towards fulfilling Clinix strategic objectives in providing a world class integrated health system that ensures excellence in health and healthcare for all as a globally recognized destination for healthcare. Clinix Healthcare Nigeria is the first investment in West Africa. The Principal investor is Greenlife Pharmaceuticals and Bliss Gvs Pharmaceuticals. Both companies have outstanding repute in the Nigerian Healthcare industry.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Officer

Job Location: Lagos
     

            
    



Requirements


	Proficient in Excel, Tally, accounting software, etc
	B.Sc in Accounting
	ACA (added advantage).


Method of Application

Digital Marketer / Social Media Handler Job at Anabel Apartment and Suites




        
    

        
        Anabel Apartment and Suites is conceived to address a special niche in the dynamic hospitality environment of the Federal Capital City, Abuja. The overriding objective is to provide home comfort, elegance, exclusivity and quiet relaxation to the short-term visiting guests or the long stay residents. The Apartment Hotel is a classic hybrid of public living in an exclusive space, where privacy, personal comfort and leisure are intimately interwoven. It is indeed a retreat of peace and pleasure from the city’s bustling engagements.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Marketer / Social Media Handler

Job Location: Asokoro, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time (Onsite)
     

            
    



Description


	Are you a Digital Marketing / Social Media pro with a proven track record of driving brand visibility, growing social communities, and executing results-driven campaigns?
	Do you want to be part of a premium hospitality brand in Abuja? Then we want to meet you.
	At Anabel Apartments & Suites, we’re building a lifestyle hospitality brand that caters to diplomats, expatriates, and discerning local guests.
	We’re seeking a creative and data-driven Digital Marketer/Social Media Handler to help position our brand as a top-tier destination in Nigeria's hospitality space.


Reponsibilities
What You’ll Do:


	Develop and execute engaging content strategies across all social platforms (Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, LinkedIn, etc.)
	Plan and manage digital advertising campaigns (Meta, Google Ads, etc.)
	Drive audience growth, engagement, and conversions
	Monitor analytics and optimize strategies based on data insights
	Work closely with the GM and creative team to maintain brand consistency
	Track ROI and KPIs across campaigns
	Monitor trends and competitor activity


Requirements
What We’re Looking For:


	At least 2–3 years of proven experience in digital marketing or social media management
	Strong content creation skills (graphics, copy, video reels)
	Proficiency in tools like Canva, Meta Business Suite, Google Analytics, etc.
	Excellent communication, storytelling, and branding skills
	Portfolio or track record of successful campaigns is a must
	Experience in the hospitality or lifestyle industry is an added advantage
	Must be physically available to work onsite in Asokoro, Abuja


What You’ll Get


	Competitive pay (negotiable based on experience)
	Opportunity to grow with a fast-rising hospitality brand
	Performance-based bonuses and incentives
	A creative and supportive work environment


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV, Portfolio (or samples of past work), and a short pitch to: francklion@anabelsuites.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: Early applications are encouraged.
